traits.locale_text: Барк от Капитана, стадия абордажа 1, барк 2.

languages.text: "Связь с арсеналом потеряна. Ничего, нам сейчас нужны не макропушки, а старая добрая резня!"
"We have lost contact with the arsenal. No matter. What we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"
languages.original_text: "Связь с арсеналом потеряна. Ничего, нам сейчас нужны не макропушки, а старая добрая резня!"

traits.locale_text: "We have lost contact with the armoury. No matter, what we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"
"We have lost contact with the armoury. No matter, what we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"
"We have lost contact with the armoury. No matter. What we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"
"We have lost contact with the armoury. No matter. What we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"
"We have lost contact with the arsenal. No matter. What we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"
"We have lost contact with the arsenal. No matter. What we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"

languages.text: "Wir haben den Kontakt mit dem Arsenal verloren. Egal. Wir brauchen keine Makrokanonen, sondern ein gutes altes Blutbad!"
languages.original_text: "We have lost contact with the arsenal. No matter. What we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben den Kontakt mit dem Arsenal verloren. Egal. Wir brauchen keine Makrokanonen, sondern ein gutes altes Blutbad!"

languages.text: « Nous avons perdu tout contact avec l'arsenal. Qu'importe. Nous n'avons pas besoin de macro-canons, mais d'un bon carnage à l'ancienne ! »
languages.original_text: "We have lost contact with the arsenal. No matter. What we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons perdu tout contact avec l'arsenal. Qu'importe. Nous n'avons pas besoin de macro-canons, mais d'un bon carnage à l'ancienne ! »

languages.text: «Hemos perdido el contacto con el arsenal. ¡No importa: lo que necesitamos ahora no son macrocañones, sino una masacre a la vieja usanza!».
languages.original_text: "We have lost contact with the arsenal. No matter. What we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"

traits.locale_text: «Hemos perdido el contacto con el arsenal. ¡No importa: lo que necesitamos ahora no son macrocañones, sino una masacre a la vieja usanza!».

languages.text: “军械库已经失去了联系。不过不要紧，反正我们现在也不需要什么宏炮，来场老式的大屠杀就够了！”
languages.original_text: "We have lost contact with the arsenal. No matter. What we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"

traits.locale_text: “军械库已经失去了联系。不过不要紧，反正我们现在也不需要什么宏炮，来场老式的大屠杀就够了！”

languages.text: 「武器庫との連絡が途絶えた。問題ない。今必要なのはマクロキャノンじゃない。昔ながらの血みどろの殺戮だ！」
languages.original_text: "We have lost contact with the arsenal. No matter. What we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"

traits.locale_text: 「武器庫との連絡が途絶えた。問題ない。今必要なのはマクロキャノンじゃない。昔ながらの血みどろの殺戮だ！」

languages.text: "Cephanelikle irtibatımızı kaybettik. Mühim değil. Makro toplarıyla işimiz yok, katliam geleneğini yerine getirsek yeter!"
languages.original_text: "We have lost contact with the arsenal. No matter. What we need now is not macro-cannons but good old-fashioned carnage!"

traits.locale_text: "Cephanelikle irtibatımızı kaybettik. Mühim değil. Makro toplarıyla işimiz yok, katliam geleneğini yerine getirsek yeter!"
